framework

Class ListenerForClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • framework.ListenerForClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ListenerForClient
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class entends Thread to implement multi-thread dealing with RMI Look up. Since it is in multi-threads mode now, we should be careful about the concurrency issues.
    Author:
    Nicolas_Yu
